greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Value of the n-th Eulerian polynomial (cf. A008292) evaluated at x=-2.
formula: O.g.f.: Sum_{n>=0} n! * x^n / Product_{k=1..n} (1 + 3*k*x). [_Paul D. Hanna_, Jul 20 2011]
G.f.: 1/Q(0), where Q(k)= 1 - x*(k+1)/(1 + x*(2*k+2)/Q(k+1)); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, May 20 2013
mathematica: a[ n_] := If[ n < 0, 0, n! 3/2 SeriesCoefficient[ 1 / (1 + Exp[-3 x] / 2), {x, 0, n}]]; (* _Michael Somos_, Aug 27 2018 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<0, 0, n! * 3/2 * polcoeff( 1 / (1 + exp( -3*x + x * O(x^n)) / 2), n))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Aug 27 2018 */
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 26 2003
ext: More terms from _Paul D. Hanna_, Jul 20 2011
